text: Vampirina is an American-Irish animated television series first aired on October 1, 2017. The show is based on the "Vampirina Ballerina" series of books written by Anne Marie Pace and illustrated by LeUyen Pham, published by Disney-Hyperion. Disney Junior announced the series in March, 2016; the adaptation is being worked on by executives from Doc McStuffins. The Theme song is sung by Isabella Crovetti. ==International versions== Country Date Channel Title France October 11, 2017 Disney Junior Vampirina Germany Italy Portugal Spain Netherlands Belgium Denmark Vampyrina Norway Sweden Finland Nelonen Czechia Disney Junior October 28, 2017 Vampirina Hungary Poland Romania Russia Удивительная Ви ==References== Category:2010s American animated television series
title: Vampirina
